SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BarcodeEntity
Represents a barcode entity stored in the database.
BarcodeGenerator
A utility class responsible for generating barcode images using the Google ZXing library.
BarcodeGeneratorController
REST controller for handling barcode generation requests.
BarcodeReader
A utility class for reading and decoding barcode images.
BarcodeReaderController
REST controller responsible for handling barcode reading requests.
BarcodeRepository
Repository interface for managing BarcodeEntity instances.
BarcodeResult
Represents the result of a successfully decoded barcode.
BarcodeService
Service class for handling barcode-related operations.
BarcodeServiceApplication
 
BarcodeType
An enumeration representing different types of barcodes supported by the service.
D2WriterProvider
This class provides Spring Bean definitions for 2D barcode writers.
DynamicBeanManager
A utility class for dynamically registering and retrieving beans at runtime using a local DefaultListableBeanFactory.
Generator
An interface defining the contract for barcode generation.
GlobalExceptionHandler
Global exception handler for the barcode service.
ImageObject
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a stored image containing a barcode.
IndustrialWriterProvider
This class provides Spring Bean definitions for industrial 1D barcode writers.
ProductWriterProvider
This class provides Spring Bean definitions for product barcode writers.
ReadDto
Data Transfer Object (DTO) used for submitting barcode data in base64 format.
